document: TOWARDS A CULTURALLY IDENTIFIABLE ARCHITECTURE by Chian-Yeun Chang Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy in Environmental Design and Planning (Architecture) APPROVED: Joseph Wang, Chairman Milka Bliznakov Dennis Kilper Leonard Singer Marshall Fishwick December, 1990 Blacksburg, Virginia
